Name: KosmoSquad
About the game: KosmoSquad is a twin-stick arena shooter where you survive as long as you can against an ever-increasing hoard of enemies. Fight alone or with up to three friends and collect star multipliers to maximize your high score. Use your score points to purchase upgrades for your ship and try again! KosmoSquad has eight levels with nine difficulty settings for each level. Increasing difficulty increases the score value of enemies and the multiplier cap, allowing you to earn more points and progress faster. Upgrade your shot damage, distance, speed, and rate of fire to bring impossible challenges within reach. KosmoSquad is a challenge for all ages: it contains minimal violence, no strong language or other sensitive content. Key Features 1-4 player coop arena combat. Supports most xbox-compatible controllers, also playable with keyboard (WASD and arrow keys). 8 levels with 9 levels of difficulty for each level. Upgradeable shot damage, shot distance, shot speed, and rate of fire. Six unique enemy types, combinations, and difficulty levels force constantly evolving gameplay.
